data.actual_result: User can see infos they should maybe not be notified about, and can jump to a channel they cannot access (they can't actually send / see messages posted there, but can see the userlist)
data.expected_result: User should at least not be able to jump to the channel, and maybe not be able to see audit log's infos about channels they aren't part of?
data.short_description: Audit log can show infos about, and allows to jump to, a channel the user may not have access to
data.steps_to_repro: - On a non-admin user, get audit log access - Make a channel said user doesn't have access to - As said user, on the audit log, open an entry mentionning the channel they cannot see, right-click on the channel name, click "Jump to channel"
